label: Measurement
comment: An amount, size, or extent as established by measuring.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying the operator, such as, less than, greater than or equal to, for comparing two actual measures.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A measurement method expressed as text.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: An actual measure for this measurement.
A measure of a condition for this measurement.

referencedBy.comment: A measurement associated with this document clause.
